article_title: McDermott Expands Chicago Office With CVS Health Care Vet
article_text:
McDermott Expands Chicago Office With CVS Health Care Vet

Law360, Los Angeles (February 18, 2014, 4:35 PM ET) -- McDermott Will & Emery LLP has added a former vice president and senior counsel at CVS Caremark Corp., with extensive experience implementing health care reform, as a partner in the firm’s health industry advisory practice group in Chicago, the firm announced Tuesday.



The addition of Karen Owen Gibbs comes less than a month after McDermott lured a veteran policy official from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services to serve as senior director of health policy in its Washington, D.C., office. Prior to joining McDermott, Gibbs...
